properties.name: AB Donkers
properties.description: Posted by Amsterdam The best part of shopping Amsterdam’s most stylish stroll is finding must-have items from homegrown brands: check out AB Donkers

properties.name: Arc
properties.description: Posted by AmsterdamA first rate cocktail lounge and restaurant that seems to be a typically Amsterdam egalitarian phenomenon–it caters to a gay clientele, but the crowd is truly mixed.

properties.name: Arcam – Amsterdam Architecture Center
properties.description: Posted by AmsterdamARCAM, the city’s modern Architecture Center. is a bit of a landmark but it’s true claim to fame is that it’s a ground zero for architecture buffs hoping to get the lowdown on the city’s latest and greatest structures. Symposiums, lectures, and small exhibitions on the city’s various projects can be found inside.

properties.name: Bar Barbou at the Dylan Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Amsterdam The style savvy folks who run the Dylan Hotel know that to keep things hot and fresh you have to reinvent your image from time to time.

properties.name: Caroline Biss
properties.description: Posted by Amsterdam Tthe best part of shopping Amsterdam’s most stylish stroll is finding must-have items from homegrown brands: check out Caroline Biss for the perfect night-on-the town outfit.

properties.name: College Bar & Restaurant in the College Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Amsterdam  College Bar where history meets gorgeous Dutch design and old world Holland meets its contemporary counterpart. Located in a renovated school, the College toes the line between classic and cool with fireside seating and ornate fixtures competing for attention with a who’s-who crowd

properties.name: Fred Stoeltie Brillen
properties.description: Posted by Amsterdam The best part of shopping Amsterdam’s most stylish stroll is finding must-have items from homegrown brands: check out Fred Stoeltie Brillen

properties.name: Herrie
properties.description: Posted by Amsterdam Herman den Blijker’s critically acclaimed new-French cuisine restaurant.

properties.name: Marlies Dekkers Store
properties.description: Posted by AmsterdamIf you’ve already been to fashion week in Paris, you’ll recognize Marlies Dekkers lingerie from the runway; she’s Europe’s hottest contemporary lingerie and underwear designer

properties.name: Metz and Co.
properties.description: Posted by Amsterdam For a grand shopping experience combining the best of “Old Europe” with today’s cutting edge styles it’s hard to top Metz & Co., Amsterdam’s best appointed multilevel department store

properties.name: Puccini Bomboni
properties.description: Posted by Amsterdam You’ll want to sample Puccini Bomboni’s heavenly chocolate bon-bons. Of course I found comforting classics like their superbly rendered Gianduja or Milk Chocolate with Almonds, but this is an adventurous city and local tastes follow suit. I was daring and opted for delicious, if surprising, flavors like Rhubarb, Tamarind, Grapefruit, and Pepper. With two city center locations you’re never far away should you need to pick up a gourmand gift or satisfy your own luxurious chocolate yearnings.

properties.name: Reflex Art SUMMER
properties.description: Posted by Amsterdam A two-in-one gallery–one building houses modern artists while the other is home to contemporary pieces–Reflex’s stable of artists reads like a who’s-who on the art circuit as well as an A-list party line up. Jeff Koons, Willem de Kooning and Pablo Picasso are all represented by Reflex but perhaps it’s strength is found in the host of contemporary photographers whose wares grace the walls.

properties.name: Soap Treatment Store
properties.description: Posted by Amsterdam Jet lag be damned! Take a break from retail therapy and go for the real thing: pamper your mind, body and soul at Soap Treatment Store, the city center spa that you’ll want to add to speed dial. The clean–but not clinical–sleek chic décor in white on white with pale wooden floors offers the perfect time out from a day spent pounding Amsterdam’s endless shopping pavement, and Soap’s aromatherapy, massage, manicures, and wraps will allow you to conquer any lingering jet lag in style.

properties.name: Stedelijk Museum CS
properties.description: Posted by Amsterdam  No discussion of Amsterdam’s legendary contemporary art spaces is complete without mentioning my favorite; the temporary Stedelijk CS Museum

properties.name: Van Gogh Museum
properties.description: Posted by Amsterdam  Perhaps the best–and most beautiful–example of the old embracing the new can be experienced at the magnificent Van Gogh Museum where the world’s largest collection of the artist’s work is housed in two landmark buildings; one by Dutch superstar Gerrit Rietveld and the other by Kisho Kurokawa.

properties.name: Wolvenstraat
properties.description: Posted by AmsterdamA low-key lounge-y restaurant that’s been open for a few years attracting chilled out locals in droves

properties.name: XtraCold Amsterdam
properties.description: Posted by AmsterdamYes, the entire thing is made of ice, yes they provide you with a jacket and mittens at the door, and no, bundling up doesn’t seem to put a damper on the scene.
